column1: Question
Who do they look up to?
What jobs did they have in the past?
Which character would be the first to notice something off about an area/person?
Do they have any features that they weren't born with (tattoos, piercings, scars, etc)?
What is their relationship to their family? If applicable, to their "found" family?
Do they have a significant other(s)? If so, what is their relationship with them?
Did they have a relationship in the past?
What school subject do they struggle in the most?
What kind of education did they recieve?
What beliefs and values do they hold?
Where do they come from?
If they could change one thing about themselves, what would they change?
Do they think more with feelings or facts?
How do they respond when they're afraid?
What do they regret?
What is their breaking point?
What is your character's place in the social hierarchy?
Is there anyone that is commonly hated by many?
What is your character's economical standing? (like middle class, upper, etc.)
Did they grow up in an urban, rural, or suburban area?
What secrets do they hold and why?
Does your character have any special abilities?
Does your character have any "enhancements"?
How familiar is your character with magic?
Are they more introverted or extroverted?
How frequently do they practice religion, if at all?
What would they be famous/infamous for in today's world?
Are they bilingual?
Do they have an accent? How strong is it?
What is their ethnicity?
What kind of food do they eat?
What music would they listen to?
What are some formative expiriences from their childhood?
What sorts of imagery or symbols represent them? Why?
What was their first romantic experience like? (if applicable)
How has their cultural background influece their current self?
How do they pass the time?
What is their greatest fear?
What is their gender/sexuality? What are their pronouns?
What are their nicknames/aliases?
What motivates them to keep going?
Are they good with children?
How do they express anger or frustration?
How do they express grief and sorrow?
What are their pet peeves?
What gives them comfort when they're feeling anxious or upset?
How do they express nervousness or anxiety? How do they cope with it?
What does their voice sound like? How do they speak? What's the tone quality, pitch, and accent?
Do they tend to take risks?
Is their sense of direction any good?
Do they have a sense of superiority over others?
What belongings do they carry with them on a daily basis?
What is their grooming routine like?
How do they show affection for others?
How do they spend their disposable income?
What are their hobbies?
Do they have any hidden talents?
Are they the oldest, middle or youngest child in their family? Or are they an only child?
What is their favorite holiday?
What grievances do they have with their culture?
What culturally specific experiences do they have that outsiders wouldn't relate to?
How do they style their hair?
What drinks do they usually order? How do they order them?
Do they have any pets, companions, or familiars?
In one sentence, describe their personal philosophy.
Where do they sleep?
When was the last time they cried, and why?
Have they suffered any significant physical trauma?
Do they create art (visual, audio, etc.)? What is it like?
